title: Venom Foundation Ushers in a New Blockchain Era with Mainnet Launch
description: In a significant leap for blockchain innovation, the Venom Foundation is excited to announce its mainnet launch with a $VENOM token generation event, marking a pivotal development in digital assets and ecosystems. Venom, as an asynchronous and scalable blockchain, is fostering innovation in finance solutions, having signed various MOUs on different government levels, to explore areas of Central Bank Digital Currencies, fiat-backed stablecoins, and Real-World-Asset tokenization.

title: BTC, ETH investors turn attention to Kelexo presale
description: As Bitcoin (BTC) experiences a sharp decline to $63k and Ethereum (ETH) halts its bull run, investors are shifting their focus to the Kelexo (KLXO) presale, drawn by its features and potential. #partnercontent

title: Bitcoin Halving In Less Than 30 Days, Investors Optimism Rises In 3 Altcoins For 300% Surge
description: Bitcoin halving is around the corner and active investors started preparing for one of the greatest fests in the crypto space. The Bitcoin algorithm reduces the production of cryptocurrency by slashing down the mining rewards after every 210,000 blocks. This roughly takes up to 4 years and the next Bitcoin halving is less than 30 [...]
